txt.en: 'I know that you have already been to Aldburg and assisted them there, but I think you should return to Arcil and let him know of your victory here today.\n\n'I am certain that he would be pleased to learn that the Boar-tribe Orcs no longer pose a threat.'
With your aid, the Boar-tribe Orcs were defeated and their cavernous lair put to ruin.
Thane Arcil is in the Mead Hall of Aldburg.\n\nThane Cútha told you to return to Aldburg and speak with Thane Arcil.
All Roads Lead Back to Aldburg

'[placeholder], it is good to see you again! The Boar-tribe Orcs have been defeated you say?

'You are modest, but I doubt not that you had a hand in their defeat. There may be some stragglers still about, but with their chieftain defeated, they will not prove much of a threat.

'You have done so much for us in a time when we needed it most. I am certain, though, that others might need your help more than we do now.'
Aldburg is west of Beaconwatch.\n\nCútha told you to return to Aldburg and let Arcil know of your victory against the Boar-tribe.
